titleStmt.title: A discourse of closet (or secret) prayer from Matt. VI 6 first preached and now published at the request of those that heard it / by Samuel Slater.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jonathan Robinson and Tho. Cockerill,
